revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A Free and Impartial Study of the Holy Scriptures recommended: Being Notes on some Peculiar Texts; with Discourses and Observations on the following Subjects; viz...."
revision.text: Possibly: A Free and Impartial Study of the Holy Scriptures recommended: Being Notes on some Peculiar Texts; with Discourses and Observations on the following Subjects; viz. I. Of the Quotations from the Old Testament in the Apocrypha. II. Of the Septuagint Version of the Bible..., by Joseph Hallet Junr. 3v. (London : Printed for J. Noon, at the White-Hart, in Cheapside, near Mercers-Chapel, M.DCC.XXIX.-1736. [1729-1736]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2408705~S1
